name: Private Car
description: Individually owned motor vehicle used for personal trips.

name: Motorcycle / Scooter
description: Two-wheeled motorised vehicle for solo or two-person travel.

name: Carsharing
description: Shared access to cars on demand through a membership or app.

name: Bicycle (private)
description: User-owned bicycle for short-to-medium distance trips.

name: E-scooter (shared)
description: Electric micromobility vehicles available for short, on-demand trips.

name: Walking
description: Pedestrian travel for short distances; zero-emission active mode.

name: Bus
description: Scheduled public transport on roads serving local or regional routes.

name: Tram / Light Rail
description: Electric rail-based public transport operating on urban corridors.

name: Metro / Subway
description: High-capacity rapid transit serving dense urban areas.

name: Regional Train
description: Rail services connecting cities and suburbs over longer distances.

name: On-demand Shuttle
description: Flexible shared transit that adapts routes and schedules to demand.

name: Park & Ride
description: Parking facilities that connect private cars to public transport hubs.
